faq.question: What is Sui Rekt?
faq.answer: Sui Rekt is a revolutionary meme token built on cutting-edge blockchain technology, combining the fun of meme culture with real utility and community governance.

faq.question: How can I buy SUIREKT tokens?
faq.answer: You can purchase SUIREKT tokens through our partner DEX platforms. Simply connect your wallet, swap your preferred cryptocurrency for SUIREKT, and join our community.

faq.question: What makes Sui Rekt unique?
faq.answer: Sui Rekt stands out through its innovative tokenomics, strong community focus, and real utility features including staking, NFTs, and DAO governance.

faq.question: Is the smart contract audited?
faq.answer: Yes, our smart contract has been thoroughly audited by leading blockchain security firms to ensure the safety of our holders' investments.

faq.question: How can I participate in governance?
faq.answer: SUIREKT token holders can participate in governance by voting on proposals through our DAO platform, helping shape the future of the project.
